text.p: You can cast witch spells you know. You know three tier 1 spells of your choice from the witch spell list. Each time you gain a level, you choose new witch spells to learn according to the Witch Spells Known table. You use your Charisma stat to cast witch spells. The DC is 10 + the spell's tier. If you fail a spellcasting check, you can't cast that spell again until you complete a rest. If you roll a natural 1 on a spellcasting check, you must also roll on the corresponding Diabolical Mishap table for the spell's tier.
